Author: Sevii
Name: Material UI
Description: Auto updating Material UI with customizable accent color and more. Icon by Meconate

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch
Description:
This Plugin does nothing on its own. Neko Fans needs to be installed.
You now have access to NSFW images in Neko Fans.
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl! Or look at sexy anime tiddies!

Description: Add a link to teleport to the nearest aetheryte into map link in chat.
Name: Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat
Punchline: Quick teleport for Mob Hunting

Author: veyn
Name: Boss Mod
Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore
Description: A bunch of utilities to simplify bosses. Currently supports endwalker content.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer
Punchline: Change and save appearance of players.
Description: Adds functionality to change and store appearance of players, customization and equip. Requires Penumbra to be installed and activated to work. Can also add preview options to the Changed Items tab for Penumbra.

Author: Drahsid
Name: Better Shadows
Description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
Punchline: Take control of your shadows!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Hybrid Camera
Punchline: Legacy and standard movement in one! Move freely!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Resizable HUD
Description: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
Punchline: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Target Lines
Punchline: Customizable target lines

Author: NightmareXIV and AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: Allows you to automatically change your appearance based on various conditions.
Description: Automates character appearance changes through rule-based presets, utilizing integration with other popular customization plugins. This enables seamless and context-sensitive transformations, enriching gameplay and increasing immersion.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: HuntTrainAssistant
Punchline: [beta] Hunt train assistance tool.
Description: Provides useful tools for hunt trains such as: highlighting conductor messages and muting all other chat, auto-opening flags from conductors and auto-teleporting to announced destination.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: DSR Toolbox
Punchline: A helper plugin for Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate).
Description:
Current functions:
Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AbyssosToolbox
Punchline: An assistance tool for fights in Abyssos.
Description: Splatoon v2.1.1.0+ REQUIRED! Current functions: display of P6S unsafe tiles.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: WeathermanExtras
Punchline: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping. Useful mostly for alt levelling. Requires /at command to be typed on each log in to be enabled.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: SelectString
Punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.
Description: Numpad is also supported. Note: some menus, like World Visit, are not supported, and whether they will be in future or not remains a question.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Prioritizer
Punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: UnloadErrorFuckOff
Punchline: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors. Plugin development is made easy once again!

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Imagenation
Punchline: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: ObjectExplorer
Punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Instancinator
Punchline: [beta] A helper to change instances in instanced areas. Requires Yes Already to be installed and enabled.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Changed: The plugin now uses Dalamud's language setting and will fall back to English if there's no translation available. If you haven't changed the language in HaselTweaks itself, nothing will change for you.
- Fixed: Item names, chocobo colors or portrait expressions, are now respecting the language selected in Dalamud instead of using the client's language.

Gear Set Grid

- Fixed: When opened in game and returned to the main menu, the window was still visible. It is now automatically hidden when you're not logged in.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Punchline: A little helper for Levequests.
Changelog:
- Changed: The plugin now uses Dalamud's language setting and will fall back to English if there's no translation available. If you haven't changed the language in LeveHelper itself, nothing will change for you.
- Fixed: Issuer for Blood in the Water at level 68 was incorrect.  
  If someone could update it on the Gamer Escape's wiki, that would be awesome. I can't because my ISPs IP address is listed on DNSBL. ‍️

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog:
- Added: A context menu for the required quest icon was added with an option to open the quest on Garland Tools DB. (Screenshot)
- Changed: The tomestone icon and quantity in the "Tomestones Required" column will be darkened if you have fewer tombstones than needed for that item. (Screenshot)
- Fixed: In the Triple Triad Cards tooltip, the fourth and fifth stars were on opposite sides. (Screenshot)
